channel.title: Is there a way to have a default fallback utterance? – Politepix

item.title: Is there a way to have a default fallback utterance?
item.dc:creator: seanxiaoxiao
item.description:
Hi there,

I would like to ask how to configure in the way such that open ear would support selected few commands. If none of the commands are spoken, open ear would report a empty utterance. My experience now is that it will randomly give me a one defined in the command line list if I failed to speak any of them. Sometimes the score is even 0.

Thanks,
Sean

item.title: Reply To: Is there a way to have a default fallback utterance?

item.description:
